snippet: The Broad Street brogue — soda is sewda, house is hay-ouse — is sadly absent in the movies.
abstract: Loose Ends column by Prof Daniel Nester underscores how distinctive the Philadelphia regional accent is, and how difficult it is to imitate.
lead_paragraph: The Broad Street brogue — soda is sewda, house is hay-ouse — is sadly absent in the movies.

headline.print_headline: The Sound of Philadelphia Fades Out
headline.main: The Sound of Philadelphia Fades Out
